Tag.description: To add or update tag, provide both key and value. To delete tag, provide only tag key to be deleted.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

ApplicationId.markdownDescription:
The ID of the application.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 36  

Maximum Length: 36  

Pattern: ^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}$  

Update requires: No interruption

ApplicationArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the application.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 1600  

Pattern: ^arn:[!-~]+$  

Update requires: No interruption

ApplicationName.description: Application Name, should be between 1 and 256 characters.
ApplicationName.markdownDescription:
Application Name, should be between 1 and 256 characters.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 256  

Pattern: ^[ -~]*$  

Update requires: No interruption

ApplicationDescription.description: Application Description, should be between 1 and 2048 characters.

---

Required: No

RoleArn.description: The ARN of the role that the web application assumes when it interacts with AWS IoT Core. For more info on configuring this attribute, see https://docs.aws.amazon.com/iot/latest/apireference/API_iotfleethub_CreateApplication.html#API_iotfleethub_CreateApplication_RequestSyntax

The ARN of the role that the web application assumes when it interacts with AWS IoT Core. For more info on configuring this attribute, see https://docs.aws.amazon.com/iot/latest/apireference/API_iotfleethub_CreateApplication.html#API_iotfleethub_CreateApplication_RequestSyntax

---

Required: No
